name: Person
text: I'm Autumn and I'm the mayors assistant! Nice to meet you!

name: You
text: Nice to meet you too, I guess.

name: Autumn
text: Haha, You know, I'm right on my way to get mayors morning coffee

name: Autumn
text: but the weather is just too perfect!

name: Autumn
text: That's why I've been standing here for the past hour now.

name: Autumn
text: HUUH? Nooo, I wouldn't call it that!

name: Autumn
text: Anyways,enough about me! Why are you here?

name: Autumn
text: Are you perhaps visiting friends? Or are you on vacation?
